guides.title: e-Passport Application
guides.overview: The Bangladesh e-Passport is an electronic machine-readable passport with biometric security features including fingerprint and facial recognition. Any Bangladeshi citizen with a valid National ID Card (for adults) or Digital Birth Certificate (for minors) can apply online at epassport.gov.bd. The e-Passport is available in 48-page and 64-page variants with 5-year or 10-year validity options.

steps.title: Check e-Passport Availability
steps.description: Verify that e-Passport enrollment is available in your area by checking the list of functional e-Passport offices on the official portal. Not all passport offices have biometric enrollment capabilities yet.

citations.quoted_text: Check if the new e-Passport is already available in your area - List of functional e-Passport Offices

steps.title: Complete Online Application
steps.description: Visit www.epassport.gov.bd and create an account using your email address. Fill in the application form with your personal details including NID number, address, and family information. Upload a recent passport-sized photo meeting the specified requirements. You will receive an Application ID upon successful submission.

citations.quoted_text: Fill in your e-Passport application online - For Online Application Click Here

steps.title: Pay Passport Fees
steps.description: Pay the e-Passport fees through one of the available methods: Online payment via ekpay (supports VISA, MasterCard, American Express, bKash, Nagad, Rocket, and various bank cards), or offline payment at any government or private bank through A-Challan. Choose your delivery type (Regular, Express, or Super Express) which determines the fee amount.

citations.quoted_text: e-Passport fees can be paid Online through ekpay (VISA, Master Card, American Express, bKash, Nagad, Rocket, Upay, Dmoney, OK Wallet) or Offline at any government or private banks through A-Challan

steps.title: Book Appointment & Biometric Enrollment
steps.description: After payment confirmation, schedule an appointment at your preferred passport enrollment center. On your appointment date, visit the center with all required documents. Your biometric data (fingerprints and photograph) will be captured. Ensure you bring the printed application summary, original documents, and payment receipts.

citations.quoted_text: Visit your Passport Office for biometric enrolment. Make sure you have all required documents with you when you visit the passport office.

steps.title: Collect Your e-Passport
steps.description: Your e-Passport will be ready for collection within the timeframe based on your selected delivery type: 15 working days for Regular, 7 working days for Express, or 2 working days for Super Express. Collect from your designated passport office or receive via postal delivery if selected. Track your application status online using your Application ID.

citations.quoted_text: Collect your e-Passport at the passport office or by postal service

eligibility.label: Bangladeshi Citizens
eligibility.description: Any Bangladeshi citizen is eligible to apply for an e-Passport regardless of age

citations.quoted_text: Any Bangladeshi citizen can apply for new E-PP (Electronic Passport)

eligibility.label: Valid NID Required (18+ years)
eligibility.description: Adults must have a valid 17-digit National ID Card to apply

citations.quoted_text: Bangladeshi citizen who has valid NID can apply

eligibility.label: Digital Birth Certificate (Under 18)
eligibility.description: Minors must have an online 17-digit Digital Birth Registration Certificate

citations.quoted_text: digital birth certificate (applicable only for applicants below 18 years of age)

required_documents.label: Application Summary Sheet with Appointment
required_documents.description: Printed copy of the online application summary showing your appointment details

citations.quoted_text: Application Summary Sheet with Appointment – Printed

required_documents.label: Full Application Form with Barcode
required_documents.description: Printed copy of the complete application form with the system-generated barcode

citations.quoted_text: Full Application Form with Barcode – Printed

required_documents.label: Online Birth Registration Certificate (Original)
required_documents.description: Original signed version of the 17-digit Birth Registration Certificate. A verified copy may be required if your Birth Certificate is old.

citations.quoted_text: Bangladeshi Online 17-Digit Birth Registration Certificate (BRC) – Original signed version only

required_documents.label: National ID Card (NID)
required_documents.description: Original National ID Card for applicants 18 years and above

citations.quoted_text: Valid Machine Readable Passport (MRP), NID

required_documents.label: Previous Passport (if applicable)
required_documents.description: Original previous passport for renewal or re-issue applications

citations.quoted_text: Valid Machine Readable Passport (MRP)

required_documents.label: Payment Receipt
required_documents.description: eChalan or aChalan payment receipt as proof of fee payment

citations.quoted_text: To check and download online payment slip (eChalan) or offline payment slip (aChalan)

processing_time.label: Regular Delivery
processing_time.description: Within 15 working days (21 calendar days) from biometric enrollment

citations.quoted_text: Regular Delivery: Within 15 Working days / 21 days from the biometric enrolment date

processing_time.label: Express Delivery
processing_time.description: Within 7 working days (10 calendar days) from biometric enrollment

citations.quoted_text: Express Delivery: Within 7 Working days / 10 days from the biometric enrolment date

processing_time.label: Super Express Delivery
processing_time.description: Within 2 working days from biometric enrollment

citations.quoted_text: Super Express Delivery: Within 2 Working days from the biometric enrolment date

processing_time.label: Government Employees Special Rate
processing_time.description: With NOC/PRL: Express facilities at Regular fees, Super Express at Express fees

citations.quoted_text: Govt employees who have No Objection Certificate (NOC)/Retirement document (PRL): Express facilities with Regular fees, Super-Express facilities with Express fees

service_info.label: Online Payment via ekpay
service_info.description: Supports VISA, MasterCard, American Express, bKash, Nagad, Rocket, Upay, Dmoney, OK Wallet, and various bank cards

citations.quoted_text: Online: Through ekpay (VISA, Master Card, American Express, bKash, Nagad, Rocket, Upay, Dmoney, OK Wallet, Bank Asia, Brack Bank, EBL, City Bank, UCB, AB Bank, DBBL, Midland Bank, MBL Rainbow)

service_info.label: Offline Payment via A-Challan
service_info.description: Can be paid at any government or private bank through the A-Challan system

citations.quoted_text: Offline: Can be paid at any government or private banks through A-Challan

service_info.label: All fees include 15% VAT
service_info.description: The stated e-Passport fees for Bangladesh applicants include 15% VAT

citations.quoted_text: e-Passport fees for inside Bangladesh (Including 15% VAT)
